txt.en: 'Are you any good at hunting game? The fallow deer have been just dreadful this year. We always have a little problem with them eating the crops, but of late they have been overmuch! Hunting some deer would do us much good, and the meat would not be unwelcome. It could be used to make a tasty stew that would keep my son and myself fed for quite some time.'
You have hunted deer and collected venison. You should bring the meat to Urama.
Fallow deer have been damaging the fields more than usual this year. Urama has asked you to hunt deer and bring her the venison.
'Oh, that meat... just look at it! Thank you, my son and I will eat well for a stretch.'
The destructive Ikorbâni harts and hinds can be found in the rice fields of Ekagar in Ambarûl.
'Hunting Ikorbâni harts and hinds will help protect the fields from destruction. If you bring me the venison when you are done, I will use it to make a hearty stew.'
